svg.text: BC Gov AI Hub - Tenant Resource Group Model
Multi-Tenant Architecture with IP Allocation & AVM Modules
OpenAPI: /health/* endpoints only | Rate Limit: 1000 req/min
OpenAPI: /sdpr/* endpoints only | Rate Limit: 500 req/min

g.text: Doc Intelligence, AI Search can be shared
If no AVM module → not supported
Plan carefully, request increase if needed
